title: Balanced generation of holes and superoxide radicals on Bi25CoO40 sillenite photocatalysts for rapid synergetic degradation of quinolone antibiotics
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3178-3191
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00177J, Paper
Hao Sun, Chen Wang, Yunhang Shao, Yaning Zhang, Chaofeng Chen, Hongyan Liu, Shuai Dou, Jing Xu, Ying Zhang, Yang Lou, Hui Wang, Yongfa Zhu, Chengsi Pan
The internal electric field in nanosheets induces the balanced generation of holes and superoxide radicals, which synergistically degrade ciprofloxacin rapidly.
